## readTerminalConfig() function

Try to read terminal colors from config files.

Currently supports VS Code family editors (VS Code, Cursor, Windsurf). Detects the current editor and attempts to parse its settings.json file to extract terminal color customizations.

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function readTerminalConfig(): ParsedTerminalColors | null;
```
**Returns:**

[ParsedTerminalColors](./chromaterm.parsedterminalcolors.md) \| null

Parsed terminal colors if found and configured, null otherwise
